item.description:
Come join us Friday evening for drinks, dinner, networking and meeting new people, and dancing!

Some of us decided to organize a get-together this coming Friday and figured it would be more fun if everybody else had a chance to join in.

We had to change the bar since Intermission lounge could not accomodate our group. We will be meeting at the Lobby/Avenue One bar in the Hyatt for a drink at 7:00pm and head to dinner after. The Hyatt is one block away from Chinatown.

We have reservations at East Ocean City (http://www.eastoceancity.com/) at 8:30pm, so we will head over there around 8:20pm.

We will head to Gypsy Bar (dance club) on Boylston St. after dinner.

*As always, please update your RSVP if your plans change.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Friday get-together
